Description.Text: Villa Mystique Belgrade is a friendly 4-star hotel offering modern accommodation near the heart of Belgrade. Highlights include a restaurant, free Wi-Fi and a chic interior. Senjak is an upscale district of the city populated by embassies and lavish residences. Nearby places of interest include Hajd park, the Belgrade Hippodrome, the Golf Club Belgrade and the Museum of African Art. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Belgrade destinations. The hotel is housed in a 20th-century low-rise building with arched windows and decorative arches on its porch. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a simple modern style with dark wood furniture. Amenities include a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, safe and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The restaurant offers national cuisine in a cosy space with exposed brick walls and a fireplace. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
